tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，请积极使用<@gd.key>恢复技力的技能</>。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try to use <@gd.key>skills with SP recovery</>.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，请积极使用<@gd.key>恢复技力的技能</>。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try to use <@gd.key>skills with SP recovery</>.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，请积极使用<@gd.key>恢复技力的技能</>。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try to use <@gd.key>skills with SP recovery</>.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，频繁<@gd.key>施放连携技</>，可大幅提升伤害。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, frequently <@gd.key>casting combo skills</> will deal a lot more DMG.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，频繁<@gd.key>施放连携技</>，可大幅提升伤害。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, frequently <@gd.key>casting combo skills</> will deal a lot more DMG.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，频繁<@gd.key>施放连携技</>，可大幅提升伤害。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, frequently <@gd.key>casting combo skills</> will deal a lot more DMG.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，频繁<@gd.key>施放连携技</>，可大幅提升伤害。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, frequently <@gd.key>casting combo skills</> will deal a lot more DMG.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中具有<@gd.key>毒性雾气</>，击败敌人以维持全队血量。
tipContents.en: This Protocol Space has a <@gd.key>poisonous mist</>. Defeat enemies to restore the HP of operators in the team.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中具有<@gd.key>毒性雾气</>，击败敌人以维持全队血量。
tipContents.en: This Protocol Space has a <@gd.key>poisonous mist</>. Defeat enemies to restore the HP of operators in the team.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中具有<@gd.key>毒性雾气</>，击败敌人以维持全队血量。
tipContents.en: This Protocol Space has a <@gd.key>poisonous mist</>. Defeat enemies to restore the HP of operators in the team.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中具有<@gd.key>毒性雾气</>，击败敌人以维持全队血量。
tipContents.en: This Protocol Space has a <@gd.key>poisonous mist</>. Defeat enemies to restore the HP of operators in the team.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中具有<@gd.key>毒性雾气</>，击败敌人以维持全队血量。
tipContents.en: This Protocol Space has a <@gd.key>poisonous mist</>. Defeat enemies to restore the HP of operators in the team.

tipContents.cn: 触碰涡流团后，主控干员会加速一小段时间。
tipContents.en: Touch the vortex to give a temporary speed boost to the operator you are controlling.

tipContents.cn: 合理规划路线，并利用涡流团，尽快抵达终点。
tipContents.en: Plan your route and use the vortices to reach the exit quickly.

tipContents.cn: 灵活躲避防御激光，尽快抵达终点。
tipContents.en: Dodge the defensive beams and reach the exit as quickly as you can.

tipContents.cn: 部分防御激光与开关相关联，关闭开关后，对应的防御激光就会解除。
tipContents.en: Some defensive beams can be switched off. Look for the switches to turn them off.

tipContents.cn: 岗哨天使会周期性进行轰击，注意进行躲避。
tipContents.en: The Sentinel bombards the area on a regular basis. Dodge the bombs.

tipContents.cn: 小心躲避协议空间中的火墙。
tipContents.en: Dodge the burning walls in the Protocol Space.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，尽快触发<@gd.key>失衡</>，利用<@gd.key>处决伤害</>快速击败敌人。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try applying <@gd.key>Staggered</> quickly, then use <@gd.key>Finishers</> to quickly defeat enemies.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，尽快触发<@gd.key>失衡</>，利用<@gd.key>处决伤害</>快速击败敌人。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try applying <@gd.key>Staggered</> quickly, then use <@gd.key>Finishers</> to quickly defeat enemies.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，尽快触发<@gd.key>失衡</>，利用<@gd.key>处决伤害</>快速击败敌人。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try applying <@gd.key>Staggered</> quickly, then use <@gd.key>Finishers</> to quickly defeat enemies.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，尽快触发<@gd.key>失衡</>，利用<@gd.key>处决伤害</>快速击败敌人。

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，尽快触发<@gd.key>失衡</>，利用<@gd.key>处决伤害</>快速击败敌人。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try applying <@gd.key>Staggered</> quickly, then use <@gd.key>Finishers</> to quickly defeat enemies.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，请多造成<@gd.key>物理异常</>，以造成更高伤害。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try applying <@gd.key>Physical Statuses</> often to deal more DMG.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，请多造成<@gd.key>物理异常</>，以造成更高伤害。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try applying <@gd.key>Physical Statuses</> often to deal more DMG.

tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try applying <@gd.key>Physical Statuses</> often to deal more DMG.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，请多施加<@gd.key>法术异常</>，以造成更高伤害。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try applying <@gd.key>Arts Reactions</> often to deal more DMG.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，请多施加<@gd.key>法术异常</>，以造成更高伤害。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try applying <@gd.key>Arts Reactions</> often to deal more DMG.

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，请多施加<@gd.key>法术异常</>，以造成更高伤害。

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，请多施加<@gd.key>法术异常</>，以造成更高伤害。

tipContents.cn: 该协议空间中，请多施加<@gd.key>法术异常</>，以造成更高伤害。
tipContents.en: In this Protocol Space, try applying <@gd.key>Arts Reactions</> often to deal more DMG.

tipContents.cn: 战斗时可以保留一些<@gd.key>技力</>不使用，用来应对敌人的蓄力攻击。
tipContents.en: Save some <@gd.key>SP</> during combat to cast a skill when enemies start charging up for a powerful attack.

tipContents.cn: 训练中，如果不确定自己是否做对了，就阅读一遍左侧的目标描述吧。
tipContents.en: If you're confused about the training, read the training objectives on the left side of the screen.

tipContents.cn: <@gd.key>技力</>会随时间自然回复。主控干员造成重击时也会恢复一定<@gd.key>技力</>。
tipContents.en: <@gd.key>SP</> recovers slowly over time. The controlled operator also recovers some <@gd.key>SP</> by performing Final Strikes.

tipContents.cn: 多多观察敌人的异常状态图标能帮助你洞悉当前敌人处于什么状态。
tipContents.en: Look at the enemy's status icons to know what statuses are affecting them.

tipContents.cn: 训练中，如果不确定自己是否做对了，就阅读一遍左侧的目标描述吧。
tipContents.en: If you're confused about the training, read the training objectives on the left side of the screen.

tipContents.en: <@gd.key>SP</> recovers slowly over time. The controlled operator also recovers some <@gd.key>SP</> by performing Final Strikes.

tipContents.en: If you're confused about the training, read the training objectives on the left side of the screen.

tipContents.cn: 耐心地保留两格<@gd.key>技力</>后，连续施放两个战技能更容易地触发<@gd.key>法术爆发</>。
tipContents.en: Be patient and reserve 2 <@gd.key>SP</> bars. Casting 2 battle skills consecutively is more likely to trigger an <@gd.key>Arts Burst</>.

tipContents.cn: 多多观察敌人的异常状态图标能帮助你洞悉当前敌人处于什么状态。
tipContents.en: Look at the enemy's status icons to know what statuses are affecting them.

tipContents.cn: <@gd.key>法术附着</>的顺序非常重要。后一个<@gd.key>法术附着</>会决定此次<@gd.key>法术异常</>的种类。
tipContents.en: The sequence of <@gd.key>Arts Infliction</> is very important. The last <@gd.key>Arts Infliction</> dealt will determine the type of <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</> triggered.

tipContents.cn: 训练中，如果不确定自己是否做对了，就阅读一遍左侧的目标描述吧。
tipContents.en: If you're confused about the training, read the training objectives on the left side of the screen.

tipContents.cn: 耐心地保留两格<@gd.key>技力</>后，连续施放两个战技能提高施加<@gd.key>法术异常</>的成功率。
tipContents.en: Be patient and reserve 2 <@gd.key>SP</> bars for 2 consecutive skill castings. This will increase your chances of triggering an <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</>.

tipContents.cn: 多多观察敌人的异常状态图标能帮助你洞悉当前敌人处于什么状态。
tipContents.en: Look at the enemy's status icons to know what statuses are affecting them.

tipContents.cn: 留意敌人准备攻击时的动作，此时<@gd.key>闪避</>能提高成功率。
tipContents.en: Watch the enemy's attack moves and time the <@gd.key>dodging</> to improve the odds.

tipContents.cn: 训练中，如果不确定自己是否做对了，就阅读一遍左侧的目标描述吧。
tipContents.en: If you're confused about the training, read the training objectives on the left side of the screen.

tipContents.cn: <@gd.key>技力</>会随时间自然回复。主控干员造成重击时也会恢复一定<@gd.key>技力</>。
tipContents.en: <@gd.key>SP</> recovers slowly over time. The controlled operator also recovers some <@gd.key>SP</> by performing Final Strikes.

tipContents.cn: 战斗时可以保留一些<@gd.key>技力</>不使用，用来应对敌人的蓄力攻击。
tipContents.en: Save some <@gd.key>SP</> during combat to cast a skill when enemies start charging up for a powerful attack.

tipContents.cn: 训练中，如果不确定自己是否做对了，就阅读一遍左侧的目标描述吧。
tipContents.en: If you're confused about the training, read the training objectives on the left side of the screen.

tipContents.cn: 善用<@gd.key>闪避</>，躲开冲刺中的敌人。
tipContents.en: <@gd.key>Dodge</> smartly to evade charging enemies.

tipContents.cn: 敌人的冲刺伤害较高，具有反击能力的干员应对该类攻击可能有奇效。
tipContents.en: The enemies' charge attacks deal high DMG. Operators with retaliation bash effects will effectively counter such attacks.

tipContents.cn: 善用<@gd.key>闪避</>，躲开冲刺中的敌人。
tipContents.en: <@gd.key>Dodge</> smartly to evade charging enemies.

tipContents.cn: 敌人的冲刺伤害较高，具有反击能力的干员应对该类攻击可能有奇效。
tipContents.en: The enemies' charge attacks deal high DMG. Operators with retaliation bash effects will effectively counter such attacks.

tipContents.cn: 战斗环境较为复杂时，注意观察四周情况，规避敌人的攻击。
tipContents.en: Though the battle might get a little messy, continue to observe the surroundings and avoid the enemy's attacks.

tipContents.cn: 敌人聚集时施放范围技能应对。
tipContents.en: Cast area of effect skills when enemies are pulled in together.

tipContents.cn: 战斗环境较为复杂时，注意观察四周情况，规避敌人的攻击。
tipContents.en: Though the battle might get a little messy, continue to observe the surroundings and avoid the enemy's attacks.

tipContents.cn: 敌人聚集时施放范围技能应对。
tipContents.en: Cast area of effect skills when enemies are pulled in together.

tipContents.cn: 留意敌人的机制特性，针对敌人弱点展开攻击，效率更高。
tipContents.en: Pay attention to the enemy's mechanics. Strike at their weaknesses to improve your performance.

tipContents.cn: 善用<@gd.key>闪避</>，躲开敌人的强力攻击。
tipContents.en: <@gd.key>Dodge</> smartly to evade powerful enemy attacks.

tipContents.cn: 留意敌人的机制特性，针对敌人弱点展开攻击，效率更高。
tipContents.en: Pay attention to the enemy's mechanics. Strike at their weaknesses to improve your performance.

tipContents.cn: 善用<@gd.key>闪避</>，躲开敌人的强力攻击。
tipContents.en: <@gd.key>Dodge</> smartly to evade powerful enemy attacks.

tipContents.cn: 战斗环境较为复杂时，注意观察四周情况，规避支援敌人的攻击。
tipContents.en: Though the battle might get a little messy, continue to observe the surroundings and avoid attacks from the enemy's supporting unit.

tipContents.cn: 善用<@gd.key>闪避</>，躲开敌人的强力攻击。
tipContents.en: <@gd.key>Dodge</> smartly to evade powerful enemy attacks.

tipContents.cn: 战斗环境较为复杂时，注意观察四周情况，规避支援敌人的攻击。
tipContents.en: Though the battle might get a little messy, continue to observe the surroundings and avoid attacks from the enemy's supporting unit.

tipContents.cn: 善用<@gd.key>闪避</>，躲开敌人的强力攻击。
tipContents.en: <@gd.key>Dodge</> smartly to evade powerful enemy attacks.

tipContents.cn: 敌人会持续强化自身，及时击败强化中的敌人个体。
tipContents.en: Enemies will regularly buff themselves. Try to quickly defeat enemies that are buffing themselves.

tipContents.cn: 多多观察敌人，留意敌人当前所处的强化状态。
tipContents.en: Observe the enemy and pay attention to their current enhancements.

tipContents.cn: 敌人会持续强化自身，及时击败强化中的敌人个体。
tipContents.en: Enemies will regularly buff themselves. Try to quickly defeat enemies that are buffing themselves.

tipContents.cn: 多多观察敌人，留意敌人当前所处的强化状态。
tipContents.en: Observe the enemy and pay attention to their current enhancements.

tipContents.cn: 空间中具有<@gd.key>毒性雾气</>，干员生命值持续降低，留意干员生命值。
tipContents.en: This space has a <@gd.key>poisonous mist</>. Operators will constantly lose HP. Keep an eye out for them.

tipContents.cn: 通过治疗主控干员回复全队干员生命值。
tipContents.en: Restore the controlled operator's HP to restore the HP of every operator in the team.

tipContents.cn: 空间中具有<@gd.key>毒性雾气</>，干员生命值持续降低，留意干员生命值。
tipContents.en: This space has a <@gd.key>poisonous mist</>. Operators will constantly lose HP. Keep an eye out for them.

tipContents.cn: 通过治疗主控干员回复全队干员生命值。
tipContents.en: Restore the controlled operator's HP to restore the HP of every operator in the team.
